item.trans: adj. 球形的，球面的；天体的 同义词:global, ball-shaped A rubber spherical balloon is quickly blown up in an angry sea by a ditched pilot .一个迫降的飞行员在波涛汹涌的海上向一个橡皮球迅速充气。
vt. 提供；出价；试图 n. 提议；出价；意图；录取通知书 vi. 提议；出现；献祭；求婚 同义词:afford, undertake, try, tender, lend, proposal, intention, meaning, will, bid, occur, figure, come out He offered me a glass of wine.他给了我一杯葡萄酒。
n. 贪婪，贪心 同义词:covetousness, avarice What drives the market is the balance between fear and greed .驱动市场的，是恐惧和贪婪之间的平衡。
vt. 驱使；激怒；煽动；惹起 同义词:fan, egg, anger to provoke a viot煽动骚乱
n. [计] 有效性；正确；正确性 同义词:availability, right As of February 11 , 2005 , the validity of these clearances has been extended .自2005年2月11日起，审核的有效期已经被延长了。
vt. 使用；行使；挥舞 同义词:make use of, fashion, employ, exercise She wields two languages in her office.她在办公室里使用两种语言。
n. 职业；天职；天命；神召 同义词:profession, employment, career, calling, pursuit, occupation Mr Chandler could easily have missed his vocation .钱德勒本可以很容易地错过他的职业。
adj. 野心勃勃的；有雄心的；热望的；炫耀的 同义词:thirsty, eager-beaver The agenda is ambitious , as it has to be .该议程是雄心勃勃的，这也是必须的。
n. 段落；短评；段落符号 vt. 将…分段 The teacher taught the students how to paragraph an essay.老师教学生如何把一篇文章分段。
adj. 竞争的；比赛的；求胜心切的 同义词:played, rival For freedom of speech , freedom of religion , competitive elections and a host of other accomplishments .是为了言论自由、宗教自由、有竞争的选举和其他成就的主体。
n. 干扰；骚乱；忧虑 同义词:interference, care, obstacle, disorder, worries The disturbance is sound wave , conforming to the laws of acoustic propagation in solids .这种扰动是种声波，它遵从在固体中声波的传播规律。
n. 瓷；瓷器 adj. 瓷制的；精美的 同义词:china, stoneware, china, delicate, fine Excessive detonation has caused the porcelain on this plug to break away .过分的爆炸会引起火花塞上的陶瓷头的破裂。
vt. 镀锌于…；涂锌于…；用锌处理 n. 锌 Zinc can also help the body fight lead absorption .锌元素也能帮助人体抵抗铅的吸收。
adj. 保守的 n. 保守派，守旧者 同义词:standpat, backward-looking, old guard, pontificator Even so , the report says the prediction of substantial damage by 2030 is conservative .虽然如此，报告还指出，对2030年破坏程度的预测是保守的。
n. 个性；品格；名人 同义词:being, kidney, lion, individuality Excellent personality is one of the decisive factors in English study .杰出的个性是英语学习的决定因素之一。
adv. 今后；自此以后 同义词:forwards, hereafter Like Fitz , Mr Brown henceforth be a New Labour dog .而自此以后，布朗先生就像菲茨一样成为新工党之狗。
vt. 忽视；不理；漠视；不顾 n. 忽视；不尊重 同义词:ignore, neglect, inobservancy, negligence He doesn't disregard the footnotes.他并没有不注意脚注。
n. 食谱；[临床] 处方；秘诀 同义词:secret, tips As day follows night , this is a recipe for the next crisis .就像黑夜过后是白天，这种疗法也将导致下一场危机。
vt. 使减到最少；小看，极度轻视 vi. 最小化 We had about ten hours' warning, so we were able to minimize the effects of the flood.由于在十小时前发出了警报，我们能够把水灾的破坏减至最低程度。

n. 理由；理性；动机 vi. 推论；劝说 vt. 说服；推论；辩论 同义词:motivation, excuse, incentive, sake, account, ratiocinate, prevail with, discuss, debate, satisfy, convince, argue Animals do not have the ability to reason.禽兽没有思维能力。
adv. 身体上，身体上地 Writing by hand can be physically painful for people who have it.有书写困难的人用手来写作身体上是很痛苦的。
n. 盗窃；偷；赃物 同义词:ripoff, robbery It is theft .这是盗窃行为！
n. 发言人；代言人 同义词:prolocutor, public speaker spokesman said research is needed to show if the devices save lives .发言人称，还需要进行研究，以证明该仪器是否能挽救生命。
n. 发誓；誓言；许愿 vt. 发誓；郑重宣告 vi. 发誓；郑重宣告 同义词:oath, pledge, plight one's troth, cross my heart, plight one's troth, cross my heart They vowed to love each other through all eternity.他们立誓终生相爱。
adj. 谨慎的；十分小心的 同义词:prudent, wary Yet only cautious celebration is in order .然而，仅是小心的庆祝还算合适。
vi. 移居；移居外国 vt. 移民 同义词:transmigrate, to immigrate, to migrate to emigrate from Ireland to Australia从爱尔兰移居澳大利亚
adj. 侦探的 n. 侦探 同义词:tec, hawkshaw detective inspected the room for fingerprints .侦探检查房间寻找指纹。
n. 相簿；唱片集；集邮簿；签名纪念册 She said album told a story .她说，这张专辑讲述了一个故事。
n. 军队；组；群；多数 vi. 群集；成群而行；结队 vt. 把（骑兵）编成骑兵连 同义词:army, majority, force, group, team, host, pack The spectators trooped out of the stadium.观众成群结队地走出体育场。
vi. 摇曳；踌躇；摆动 n. 动摇；踌躇；挥动者 同义词:hesitate, crane, rolling, labefaction The young trees wavered in the strong wind.小树在狂风中摇曳。
n. 惊讶；令人惊讶的事物 同义词:miration, stound And to her astonishment she brought out pearl necklaces , jewels , and rich ornaments .使她惊讶不已的是，她掏出的竟是珍珠项链，珠宝和珍贵的首饰。
n. 检查员；巡视员 同义词:supervisor, looker The inspector reproduced a machine surface to a large enough magnification .检验员把机器表面以足够大的放大倍数复现出来。
n. 大厅；休息室；会客室；游说议员的团体 vt. 对……进行游说 vi. 游说议员 同义词:sala, salle He lobbied on behalf of businessmen.他为商人们游说。
n. 描述，陈述；介绍；赠送 同义词:description, statement, representation, characterization They are varied in style , taste and presentation .在风格、味道和样式上都是不同的。
n. 地下室；地窖 同义词:undercroft, souterrain The central heating boiler is in basement .中央供暖系统的锅炉设在地下室。
adv. 其后；从那时以后 同义词:subsequently, thenceforth But , thereafter , he limited his drinking to a glass of wine after supper .不过从那以后，他就限制自己晚饭后只喝一杯葡萄酒了。
adj. 冰冷的；冷淡的；结满冰的 同义词:cold, ice-cold The moon Calisto also has a number of big holes in its rocky and icy crust .卡利斯托卫星的岩石和冰的外壳上面也有一些大的洞穴。
adj. 位于…的；处于…境遇的 v. 使位于；使处于（situate的过去分词） to be situated in the west of London位于伦敦西部
vt. 恐吓；使恐怖；使害怕 同义词:gallow, intimidate The pupils were terrified out of their senses.小学生们被吓得魂不附体。

adj. 大陆的；大陆性的 n. 欧洲人 同义词:mainland, European, EUR Despite the carnage in continental Europe , the sense of crisis among the population is not yet as great as in America or Britain .尽管欧洲大陆上的大屠杀已经开始，但是欧洲的人民对于危机的意识却没有美国和英国人民那么强烈。
n. 数据；资料；已知数 同义词:feedback, quantitative data A line of punch positions parallel to the Y datum line of a punch card .和卡片的Y基准线平行的一行穿孔位置。
adj. 勤勉的 同义词:diligent, hard-working This saying , therefore , teaches us to be industrious .因此，这句格言教导我们要勤奋用功。
vt. 说教；讲道；鼓吹；传道；反复灌输 vi. 说教；讲道；鼓吹；宣扬 n. 说教 同义词:drum in, boost, sermonize, homily The teacher kept preaching about the importance of study.老师不断地宣讲学习的重要性。
n. 装货；装载的货物 同义词:loading They sped the shipment of furs , then timber , iron , grain and coal .他们加快了皮毛的航运，然后是木材、铁、谷物和煤炭。
vt. 涉及，关系到；使担心 n. 关系；关心；关心的事 同义词:deal with, to relate to, relationship, connection, attention, consideration, bearing This matter concerns all of us.这件事与我们每个人都有关系。
n. 哗啦声；嘈杂的谈笑声；咔嗒声 vi. 发出哗啦声；喧闹的谈笑 vt. 使卡搭卡搭的响 Dishes and plates were clattering in the dining car.餐车中盘碟叮当作响。
n. 企业；事业；进取心；事业心 同义词:career, cause, undertaking, project, push The new labor unions spelled the end of free enterprise .新的工会的成立意味着自由企业的终结。

n. [数][物] 梯度；坡度；倾斜度 adj. 倾斜的；步行的 同义词:obliquity, lean, walking, raked Electro- osmosis drains the soil electrochemically by making the water move along an electric gradient in the clay.电渗透是用电化学方法使水沿泥土中的电梯度的方向运动，使土壤干燥。
n. 燃烧，氧化；骚动 同义词:burning, inflammation The most common type of reaction studied calorimetrically is combustion .量热研究中最常见的反应类型是燃烧反应。
n. 出席；到场；出席人数 同义词:presence But the secretary showed me your attendance rate .但是秘书给我看了你的出勤率。
n. 早餐；早饭 vi. 吃早餐 vt. 为…供应早餐 同义词:brekker, dejeuner I eat bread breakfast .我早餐都会吃面包。
n. 散文；单调 adj. 散文的；平凡的；乏味的 vi. 写散文；乏味地讲话 vt. 把…写成散文 同义词:essay, monotony, ordinary, stock, stupid prosing or versing写散文或作诗
n. 木炭（过去式charcoaled，过去分词charcoaled，现在分词charcoaling，第三人称单数charcoals）；炭笔 vt. 用木炭画 同义词:xylanthrax, wood coal The artist dusted the charcoal drawing down to a faint image .这位画家在素描上撒粉使其变为暗淡的图像。
n. 理论；原理；学说；推测 同义词:mechanism, element, speculation, doctrine, guess Probability theory has two distinct roles in the design of rock slopes .概率理论在岩石边坡设计中有两个性质不同的作用。
vi. 弹奏竖琴；喋喋不休；不停地说 n. 竖琴 同义词:go on about sth, witter She began to harp us to drink after dinner.用餐后，她开始弹奏起竖琴让我们饮酒消食。
adj. 有独创性的；机灵的，精制的；心灵手巧的 同义词:prepared, clever Ingenious circuits can be designed that correct for changes in the receiver sensitivity .设计灵敏的电路，以便校正接收机灵敏度的变化。
n. 内部；本质 adj. 内部的；国内的；本质的 同义词:essence, principle, texture, entity, inner, inner, domestic, essential, inside, home Some think he was an interior designer .有人说野口勇是室内设计师。
vt. 跳跃；跳过 n. 跳跃；舞会；短途旅行 vi. 跳跃；单脚跳；作短途旅行 同义词:jump, clear, jump, ball, dance, spring, jump, dance Gazelles often hop when running.瞪羚在奔跑时不时地齐足跳行。
vt. 蹒跚；使交错；使犹豫 vi. 蹒跚；犹豫 n. 蹒跚；交错安排 adj. 交错的；错开的 同义词:interlace, titubate, hesitate, titubation, hitchiness, altern, interlaced The baby dog staggered to me.小狗娃蹒跚着朝我走来。
n. 车库；汽车修理厂；飞机库 vt. 把……送入车库 同义词:carbarn, carport Can we use the garage ?我们可以使用车库吗？
adj. 熟练的，精通的 n. 精通；专家，能手 同义词:experienced, skilled, accomplished, perfect, clever, expert, specialist Mr. Barret is not proficient in diagnosis , let alone investigation .巴瑞特先生不擅长诊断，更不必提研究方面。
vt. 推进；驱使；激励；驱策 同义词:stimulate, power A sailing boat is propelled by wind.帆船是由风力推进的。
n. 皱纹 vi. 起皱 vt. 使起皱纹 同义词:rugosity, plication, crease, frounce The wind wrinkled the water with waves.风刮得水面泛起波纹。
vt. 改正；精馏；整流 同义词:correct, straighten up You should rectify your error before it is too late.你应当及时改正你的错误。
n. 石墨；黑铅 vt. 用石墨涂（或搀入等） 同义词:lead, plumbagine He uses ultrasound to break up graphite into individual layers that are dispersed in a liquid .他的方式是使用超音波将石墨变成单独的薄膜层，分散在液体中。
vt. 使漂白，使变白 vi. 变白，漂白 n. 漂白剂 同义词:snow, go white, whiten, decolorant, whitener Mary's face was brown and the sun had bleached the ends of her hair.玛丽的脸色是棕色的，且太阳已晒白了她的发梢。
n. 暴君 同义词:Pharaoh, Caesar From his youth , Mr Mugabe had all the ingredients to become a tyrant .从他的青年开始，穆加贝就具备了成为暴君的一切元素。
n. 补语；余角；补足物 vt. 补足，补助 同义词:make up a loss, make sth up This year 's report will use the Alkire - Foster approach to complement its own Human Development Index .今年的报告还将采用阿尔凯尔-福斯特方法，作为其人类发展指数的补充。
n. 优点，价值；功绩；功过 vt. 值得 vi. 应受报答 同义词:asset, importance, virtue, price, value, to be worth, be deserving of He merited all the praises they give him.他们给他的所有表扬他都受之无愧。
vt. 使困惑，使为难；使复杂化 同义词:bepuzzle, confuse His strange behaviour perplexed her greatly.他的奇怪举止使她茫然不解。
vt. 推荐；称赞；把…委托 vi. 称赞；表扬 同义词:recommend, put in a good word, speak well of, pay a tribute to I should like to commend this dictionary to you.我愿向你推荐这部词典。

n. （战争的）爆发；（疾病的）发作 vi. 爆发 同义词:explosion, burst, fit, burst, blow up One is food security , another is climate change and the third is the threat of a worldwide outbreak of influenza .其中之一是食品安全另一个是气候变化第三个是全世界范围流感爆发的威胁。
n. 衣服，服装；外表，外观 vt. 给…穿衣服 同义词:clothes, person, array, thread, outside, dress sb. in a girl garmented in silk穿着真丝衣服的女孩
n. 懦夫，懦弱的人 adj. 胆小的，懦怯的 同义词:chicken, molly, timid, harehearted Why don't you come and tear me to pieces , you coward ?你为什么不来把我撕成碎片，你这个胆小的东西？
vt. 恳求或乞求 vi. 恳求或乞求 to implore somebody to do something恳求某人做某事
n. 复合材料；合成物；菊科 adj. 复合的；合成的；菊科的 vt. 使合成；使混合 同义词:synthetic, complex material, synthetic, mulriple, babelize English is a composite of many languages .英语是多种语言混合而成的。
vt. 抵押 n. 抵押 同义词:hold in pledge, hypothecate, hypothecation, pledge My father's business is failing; he's mortgaged all his assets so as to save it.我父亲的企业在亏损，他抵押了所有资产试图挽救它。
n. 冰雹；致敬；招呼；一阵 vt. 致敬；招呼；向...欢呼；猛发；使象下雹样落下（过去式hailed，过去分词hailed，现在分词hailing，第三人称单数hails） vi. 招呼；下雹 int. 万岁；欢迎 同义词:precipitation, blast, welcome, rah They hailed him as King.大家欢呼拥戴他为国王。
n. 人质；抵押品 同义词:guarantee, pledge In practice , of course , farmers will still be hostage to the whims of the collective and its often ugly human faces .当然在实际上，农民们仍将被当作头脑发热的集体所有制和人性丑恶面的牺牲品。
vt. 诱导；引起；引诱；感应 同义词:attract, produce, cause, operate, occasion These attractions induce people to travel in that country.这些诱人之处吸引人们到那个国家去旅游。
n. 货摊；畜栏；托辞 vi. 停止，停转；拖延 vt. 拖延；使停转；使陷于泥中 同义词:booth, concession stand, desist from, come to a stop, prolong, drag on He stalled his car near the exit.他把他的车停放在靠近出口处的车位上。
n. 高原；稳定水平；托盘；平顶女帽 vi. 达到平衡；达到稳定时期 同义词:altiplano, high land, level out After initial logarithmic progress growth plateaued sharply.初期的上升进程之后，发展陡然平稳下来。
adj. 暴力的；猛烈的 同义词:fierce, hard Violent crust movements always happen near the continental shelf.陆坡区域的地壳经常出现剧烈的活动。
vt. 使适应；确定方向；使朝东 n. 东方；东方诸国 adj. 东方的 vi. 向东 同义词:adapt, condition, suit, season, east, eastern, to the east We must orient our work to the needs of the markets.我们必须调整我们的工作，以适应市场的需要。
n. 膨胀；通货膨胀；夸张；自命不凡 同义词:expansion, bulking This could be due to inflation .这个可能归因于通货膨胀。
n. 赤道 同义词:equinoctial Many rivers carry silt toward equator .许多河流带着泥沙流向赤道。
vi. 踩踏板；骑车 n. 踏板；脚蹬子 vt. 骑（自行车）；踩……的踏板 adj. 脚的；脚踏的 同义词:ride bike, footplate, treadboard, ride He pedaled his bicycle slowly up the hill.他慢悠悠地骑着自行车上山。
adj. 不足的；有缺陷的；不充分的 同义词:insufficient, short, inadequate, lacking, disabled This , then, is a world of grossly deficient demand .因此，我们置身于一个需求严重不足的世界。
adv. 向侧面地；向一旁 adj. 向侧面的；一旁的 同义词:laterad Sometimes they even push through the gums sideways .有时它们甚至会压迫牙龈侧面。
n. 障碍；妨碍；妨害；阻碍物 同义词:intervention, prevention, obstacle, let, bar Capital expenditure is a hindrance rather than a help .资本支出只会碍事，不会带来帮助。
n. 新郎 同义词:groom Good wishes showered (down) upon the bridegroom .美好的祝愿纷至新郎。
n. 进入；入口；条目；登记；报关手续；对土地的侵占 同义词:threshold, registration, access, portal Go over every statement and question every entry .查阅每个清单，对每条记录进行质疑。
vt. 抑制；镇压；废止 同义词:control, restrain, stay The rebellion against the government has been suppressed by the government troops.反政府的叛乱已被政府军平定了。

n. 剩余；残渣 adj. 剩余的；残留的 同义词:surplus, spare, remaining, surplus, odd In the end , no one could tell whether an experimental result was caused by those residual movements or the superimposed microsaccades .到后来，没有人能确定那些实验结果是由残留的眼球运动，还是由补加回去的微颤动所造成。
n. 布道；训诫；启示；冗长的讲话 vt. 对…布道；对…说教 vi. 布道 同义词:mission, message It is no use to sermon me.对我唠叨可没用。
adj. 等价的，相等的；同意义的 n. 等价物，相等物 同义词:equal, even, countertype, quid pro quo Irradiance or its equivalent , the plane radiant temperature , can be simply measured .可以简单地量测辐照度或其当量--平面辐射温度。
n. 法兰绒；法兰绒衣服；法兰绒巾 vt. 给…穿上法兰绒衣服；用法兰绒包 adj. 法兰绒的 同义词:caroset She bought a gray flannel coat .她买了件灰色的法兰绒外套。

vt. 支持，支撑，支援；扶持，帮助；赡养，供养 n. 支持，维持；支援，供养；支持者，支撑物 同义词:encourage, facilitate, second, carry, boost, holding, adhesion, backing, advocate to support an old tree with a pole用支杆支撑起一棵古树
n. 鉴定，识别；认同；身份证明 同义词:authentication, recognition And when customers sign up , they have to produce some form of identification .当顾客签约接受服务，他们必须拿出一些身份证明。
n. 暴乱；放纵；蔓延 vi. 骚乱；放荡 vt. 浪费，挥霍 同义词:loose, commotion, sow one's wild oats, easy virtue, lose, spend, consume The unsatisfied workers are rioting in the streets.心怀不满的工人们在大街上闹事。
adj. 爬虫类的；卑鄙的 n. 爬行动物；卑鄙的人 同义词:poor, mean, base, dirty, insect, ratfink Rise , and don't degrade youself into an abject reptile .起来，可别把你自己贬成一个下贱的爬虫。
n. 阳台；包厢；戏院楼厅 同义词:box, sun porch You were just upstairs in the balcony ?你刚才到楼厅上面去了吗？
vt. 改变，使…变形；转换 vi. 变换，改变；转化 同义词:influence, fashion, vary, innovate, veer from, to change A little paint will transform this old car.喷点漆就能让这辆旧车变个模样。
adv. 向后；向那边 同义词:rear, aback Laune lay luxuriously swinging to and fro in his hammock , on a warm September afternoon .九月里一个闷热的下午，劳瑞懒懒地躺在他的吊床里晃来晃去。
n. 目录；（美）大学情况一览 vt. 把…编入目录 同义词:directory, content, list He catalogued all the insects in his collection.他将所收集的昆虫编成目录。
vt. 使…变小；使…减轻；使…变少 vi. 减少；减轻；变小 同义词:to cut down, fall off to lessen production costs降低生产成本
adj. 强大的；可怕的；令人敬畏的；艰难的 同义词:powerful, terrible, august, horrible Here the practical challenges would be formidable .这在实践中将面临巨大的挑战。
vt. 区分；辨别；使杰出，使表现突出 vi. 区别，区分；辨别 同义词:tell apart, differentiate, differentiate, tell from She was distinguished from the other girls by her height.她身材高挑有别于其他女孩。
n. 回教徒；回教；伊斯兰教 同义词:Moslemism, Mohammedanism "All too many Muslims ", he wrote in the Wall Street Journal in 2005 , " fail to grasp Islam .“太多的穆斯林”，2005年他在《华尔街时报》中写道“没有掌握伊斯兰教的真义。”
n. 草地；牧场；牧草 vt. 放牧；吃草 同义词:grass, field, lawn, meadow, grass, feed, range The shepherd pastured his sheep on the village common.羊倌在村庄的公地上放羊。
n. 配件；附件；[法] 从犯 adj. 副的；同谋的；附属的 同义词:attachment, mating parts, deputy, vice, subsidiary, auxiliary He was accessory to the murder .他是那件谋杀案的从犯。
n. 兽群，畜群；放牧人 vi. 成群，聚在一起 vt. 放牧；使成群 同义词:drove, menagerie, grass, feed, range Wild geese herd to the south in autumn every year.每年秋天大雁都成群结队地飞往南方。
n. 先知；预言者；提倡者 同义词:advocate, farseer He was considered a seer and a prophet .他被看成一个先知和预言家。

adj. 不相容的；矛盾的；不能同时成立的 n. 互不相容的人或事物 同义词:antipathic, contradictory This program is linked to the missing export in the file . This machine may have an incompatible version of .该程序被链接到已不存在的出口（位于文件中）。这台机器可能有版本不兼容的。
vt. 阐明，说明；照亮；使灿烂；用灯装饰 vi. 照亮 同义词:say, lamp, elucidate, clarify, light up, to shine In the countryside, houses are still illuminated by oil lamps.在农村，房屋仍然靠油灯照明。
n. 合唱队；齐声；歌舞队 vt. 合唱；异口同声地说 vi. 合唱；异口同声地说话 同义词:choir, choir, choir The birds were chorusing around us.鸟儿在我们周围齐声歌唱。
n. 胡桃；胡桃木 adj. 胡桃科植物的 同义词:juglans Would you like some walnut cream ?你要来点奶油核桃吗？
n. 势利小人，势利眼；假内行 同义词:tuft-hunter This part of the town have a lot of snob appeal .该城的这一区很能吸引自视甚高的人。

n. 演变；进化论；进展 同义词:unfolding, Monkey to Man Evolution often takes away rather than adding .进化往往做减法而不是加法。
vi. 扩大，变阔；变宽，加宽 vt. 使扩大；使变宽 同义词:enlarge, extend, exaggerate, bulk out Our interests broadened after trips to museums.参观过许多博物馆后我们的兴趣广泛起来了。
adj. 埃及的；埃及人的 n. 埃及人；古代埃及语 The Egyptian authorities would hardly have dared to offer such a prize a decade ago .若是在十年之前，埃及当局几乎不会有勇气授其如此奖励；

n. 造船；造船业；造船术 同义词:newbuilding But the big question is how China will face up to the deterioration of market conditions threatening in the important shipbuilding nations .但关键问题是，中国将如何应对市场环境恶化给重要造船国带来的威胁。
n. 芥末；芥菜；深黄色；强烈的兴趣 同义词:dark yellow, deep yellow This mustard does not bite much .这种芥末不很辣。

adj. 以前的；在前部的 n. 前部；船头 adv. 在前面；在船头 prep. 在前 int. （打高尔夫球者的叫声）让开！ 同义词:previous, ago, front, onwards As China's middle class continued to grow , its appeal as a tourist destination came fore .随着中国中产阶层的持续壮大，海南作为旅游目的地的吸引力逐渐显现出来。
n. 可能性，可能 同义词:possibility, probability, feasibility, potential, maybe In all likelihood he would encounter no one here .十有八九，在这里也不会遇见熟人的。
n. 电工；电气技师 同义词:wireman, electrochemical engineering The electrician strapped on many tools .电工用皮带束住许多工具。
adj. 不重要的，琐碎的；琐细的 同义词:small, unimportant Nobody calls these issues trivial — but they are also among the hardest to deal with .没有人认为这些议题是微不足道的——但他们也是最难以处理的问题。
n. 公告，公报 vt. 公布，公告 同义词:announcement, declaration, post, publish, notify On the back wall is our class News Bulletin Board .我们的班级新闻公告板在后面的墙壁上。

adj. 坚持的；迫切的；显著的；引人注目的；紧急的 同义词:consistent, obvious, prominent, urgent, attractive Lawmakers were insistent that bankers not be rescued at the expense of ordinary homeowners and consumers .立法者坚持不应在损害普通住房者及消费者的情况下救援银行。
n. 神秘，秘密；奥秘；神秘的事物 同义词:secret, privacy, confidence SEX is a mystery —and not just to those who indulge in it.性是一个谜——这里的迷并不仅仅是对那些沉迷其中者而言。
n. 果冻；胶状物 vi. 成胶状 vt. 使结冻 同义词:agglutinate Waging a war on terror was always going to be like jelly to a wall .以反恐为借口的战争总像往墙壁上放果冻一样站不住脚。
n. 术语（特殊用语）表；词汇表；专业词典 Use a Project Glossary .使用项目词汇表。

adj. 永恒的；不朽的 同义词:permanent, lasting, everlasting, undying, timeless Do you think that you can find eternal love through the Internet ?你认为你可以通过互联网到永久的爱情吗？
adj. 安静的，平静的；安宁的；稳定的 同义词:peaceful, pacific, quiet, calm, steady That may be one reason why the relatively tranquil north has become progressively more dangerous .这也许是阿富汗原本相对宁静的北方地区变得日益危险的原因之一。
n. 原型；标准，模范 同义词:criterion, standard, level, norms, type The company showed the prototype of the new model at the exhibition .公司在展览会上展示了这种新模型的原型。
n. [生化] 维生素；[生化] 维他命 同义词:thiamine hydrochloride But more and more research is suggesting that vitamin D might also help prevent many diseases .但是越来越多的研究正在建议维他命D同样能帮助预防多种疾病。
n. 咸肉；腌肉；熏猪肉 同义词:cured meat, salted meat She made them ham and eggs , sausages , heaps of pancakes , bacon and milkshakes .她煮给他们火腿和蛋、香肠、一堆堆的煎饼、培根和奶昔。
n. [航][船] 螺旋桨；推进器 同义词:airscrew, airfoil The driving power enters the differential through the drive pinion on the end of the propeller shaft .也就是说，驱动力是从传动轴末端的传动齿轮输送到差速器的。
vt. 仔细考虑；衡量 vi. 考虑；沉思 同义词:mull over, reflect on, allow, think about, think of I pondered the incident,asking myself again and again how it could have happened.我反复思考那件事，一再自问究竟是怎么回事。
n. 二氧化物 Carbon monoxide , chlorine , and dioxide are examples of these gases .一氧化碳、氯气、二氧化硫就是这些气体的代表。

n. 计数器，计算器；柜台；计算者 adv. 相反地 v. 反击；反对 adj. 相反的 同义词:arithmometer, counting machine, contrary, backward, conversely, inversely, Break back, knock back, contrary, opposite, adverse, cross He countered my blow.他对我的强击进行还击。

adj. 大量的；实质的；内容充实的 n. 本质；重要材料 同义词:massive, extensive, macro, much, volume, essence, entity, principle, texture, interior This generated profit , but any substantial technical innovations required the approval of management and a re -engineering of the entire network .这是有益的，但是任何实质的技术创新都需要管理层的批准，并需要对整个网络进行重构。
n. 臀部；蔷薇果；忧郁 adj. 熟悉内情的；非常时尚的 同义词:bottom, croup He was hipped when he dropped from the tree.他从树上跌落了下来，把髋关节摔脱了臼。
adj. 瞬间的；即时的；猝发的 同义词:momentary, flashy A detonation instantaneous pulse of pressure outward in all directions .爆炸的瞬间会朝各个方向发出向外的压力波。
adj. 严厉的；严酷的；刺耳的；粗糙的；刺目的 同义词:severe, grinding, crude, tight, hard First , it is unfair to impose harsh penalties for small offences .首先，对情节轻微的犯罪施以严惩是不公平的。
n. 排水；排水系统；污水；排水面积 同义词:wastewater, bailing They do best in sun tolerate some shade and need good drainage .他们最不能容忍太阳光，一些阴影和需要好的排水系统。
adj. 恰当的；有…倾向的；灵敏的 同义词:sensitive, correct, quick, prone, liable The chameleon responding to its own shifting image apt analog of the human world of fashion .变色龙应对其自身的形象改变往往与人类世界对时尚的变化的应对相仿。
n. 资本家；九点活字；中产阶级的人；追求物质享受和社会地位者 adj. 资产阶级的；中产阶级的；贪图享受的 同义词:capital, middle-class The French Revolution was inspired by bourgeois .法国革命受到中产阶级的鼓励。

n. 化石；僵化的事物；顽固不化的人 adj. 化石的；陈腐的，守旧的 同义词:petrification, reliquiae, banal, trite Fossil teeth , and the occasional skeleton , show that small mammals were common at this time .化石牙齿和偶尔发现的骨架显示小型哺乳动物在当时很普遍。
adj. 几何的，几何学的 Right . And the only geometrical object in which every point on the surface is the same distance from the center is . . . ?是的。这么一来，能使地表所有的点都和地球中心的距离相等的唯一的几何物体是?。
n. 黄蜂；[昆] 胡蜂；易怒的人 vi. 黄蜂似的直扑 同义词:vespid Through the glass we can see wasp .透过玻璃我们可以看到黄蜂。

n. 范围；幅度；排；山脉 vi. 平行，列为一行；延伸；漫游；射程达到 vt. 漫游；放牧；使并列；归类于；来回走动 同义词:extent, boundary, region, scope, spectrum, territory, area, reach, parallel with, feed, grass The salesclerks ranged the goods in good order in the shop-windows.售货员将橱窗中的商品排列得很整齐。
n. 鼻子；嗅觉；突出的部分；探问 vt. 嗅；用鼻子触 vi. 小心探索着前进；探问 同义词:smell, boko, smell, snuff at, ask after His dog nosed me,then let me go in.他的狗闻了闻我，然后放我进去了。
